item.title: Shop problem
item.dc:creator: @Jackwebb Jackwebb
item.description:
@Jackwebb wrote:

Ok well i want this NPC to sell certain stuff

This is in NPC handler

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 1439) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Admin+Mod Food!"; }

This is in shops

Shop = 68       Mod/Admin_food	        1	1	392	 1	398	 1	362	 1	374	 1	380	 1	386	 1

This is in client.Java

} else if (NPCID == 1439) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 68; // Admin food

this is in Autospawn

spawn = 1439	3285	2768	0	0	0	0	0	1	mod/admin food

There is no trade option i think thats the reason?
How do i make it so when i talk to him it trades??

Read full topic
